input.sentences: i made sure to prepare a lot of food for tonight .
a lot of the guests wanted something to drink as well so i got them a bottle of wine .
the food was hot and fresh from the stove .
afterward it was time to leave and i had a lot of dishes to do .
output.sentences: The evening was draped with the promise of comfort.
We matched the warmth of the holidays with that of wine and pleasantries.
Our host reveled in the chance to share his culinary joys.
But as the door eventually closed, he did not look us in the eye.
